00030         {

00032                 t_symbol*       oname;

00071         int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00072         {       
00073                 t_class *c;
00074                 
00075                 c = class_new("OMax.SLT", (method)OMax_SLT_new, (method)OMax_SLT_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_SLT), 
00076                                           0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00077                 // assistance
00078                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_SLT_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00079                 class_addmethod(c, (method)stdinletinfo, "inletinfo", A_CANT, 0);
00080                 
00081                 // input methods
00082                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_SLT, "int", 0);
00083                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_path, "path", A_LONG, 0);
00084                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_fullpath, "fullpath", A_LONG, 0);
00085                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_sortedSLT, "sorted", A_LONG, 0);
00086                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_sortedSLTbis, "sorted", A_LONG, A_LONG, 0);
00087                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_ctxt, "in1", A_LONG, 0);
00088                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_setname, "set", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00089                 
00090                 class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00091                 OMax_SLT_class = c;
00092                 
00093                 return 0;
00094         }

00101         void *OMax_SLT_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00102         {
00103                 t_OMax_SLT *x = NULL;
00104                 
00105                 if ((x = (t_OMax_SLT *)object_alloc(OMax_SLT_class)))
00106                 {
00107                         // inlets
00108                         intin(x, 1); // right inlet
00109                         
00110                         // outlets
00111                         x->out_path = listout(x); // rightmost
00112                         x->out_SLT = listout(x);
00113                         x->out_root = intout(x);
00114                         
00116                         x->obound = FALSE;
00117             switch(argc)
00118             {
00119                 case 2:
00120                 {
00121                     if ((argv+1)->a_type == A_LONG)
00122                                                 x->context = atom_getlong(argv+1);
00123                                         else
00125                                                 x->context = 3;
00126                 }
00127                 case 1:
00128                 {
00129                     if (argv->a_type != A_SYM)
00130                         object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of an existing Oracle)");
00131                     else
00132                     {
00133                         x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00134                         break;
00135                     }
00136                 }
00137                 case 0:
00138                 {
00139                     x->oname = NULL;
00140                     x->context = 3;
00141                 }
00142                         }
00143                         
00144                         // color
00145                         t_object *box;
00146                         t_jrgba colorvals;
00147                         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00148                         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00149                         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);                        
00150                 }
00151                 return (x);
00152         }
00153

00157         {
00158                 ;
00159         }
00160         
00163         void OMax_SLT_assist(t_OMax_SLT *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00164         {
00165                 switch (io)
00166                 {
00167             case 1: // inlets
00168                                 switch (index)
00169                         {
00170                                 case 0: // leftmost
00171                                         sprintf(s, "int: get path & SLT of this state\n path int: get suffix path\n fullpath int: get whole suffix path (to 0)");
00172                                         break;
00173                                 case 1:
00174                                         sprintf(s, "minimal context of path & SLT");
00175                         }
00176                 break;
00177             case 2: // outlets
00178                                 switch (index)
00179                         {
00180                                 case 0:
00181                                         sprintf(s, "root of the SLT");
00182                                         break;
00183                                 case 1:
00184                                         sprintf(s, "states & lrs in the SLT");
00185                                         break;
00186                                 case 2:
00187                                         sprintf(s, "path to the root");
00188                                         break;
00189                         }
00190                                 break;
00191                 }
00192         }

00198         
00201         bool OMax_SLT_bind(t_OMax_SLT *x)
00202         {
00204                 if (x->obound == FALSE)
00205                 {
00207                         if ((x->oname) && (x->oname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->oname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.oracle")))
00208                         {
00209                                 x->oracle = &(((t_OMax_oracle*)(x->oname->s_thing))->oracle);
00210                                 // If binding is ok, then don't do it next time.
00211                                 x->obound = TRUE;
00212                         }
00213                         else
00214                         {
00215                 if (x->oname)
00216                     object_error((t_object *)x,"No oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00217                 else
00218                     object_error((t_object *)x,"No oracle name given");
00219                         }
00220                 }
00221                 return x->obound;
00222         }
00223

00232         void OMax_setname(t_OMax_SLT *x, t_symbol *s)
00233         {
00234                 x->oname = s;
00235                 x->obound = FALSE;
00236                 OMax_SLT_bind(x);
00237         }
00238         
00242         void OMax_SLT(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb)
00243         {
00244                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00245                 {
00246                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00247                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00248                         {
00249                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00250                                 {
00251                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00252                                         
00254                                         char err;
00255                                         long i = 0;
00256                                         list<O_state*> path;
00257                                         list<O_state*>::iterator pathit;
00258                                         
00259                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, x->context);
00260                                         
00261                                         t_atom_long pathvals[path.size()];
00262                                         t_atom * pathout = NULL;
00263                                         for (pathit = path.begin(); pathit!=path.end(); pathit++)
00264                                         {
00265                                                 pathvals[i]=(*pathit)->get_statenb();
00266                                                 i++;
00267                                         }
00268                                         atom_alloc_array((long)path.size(), &i, &pathout, &err);
00269                                         if(err)
00270                                         {
00271                                                 atom_setlong_array((long)path.size(),pathout, (long)path.size(),pathvals);
00273                                                 outlet_list(x->out_path, NULL, (short)path.size(), pathout);
00274                                         }
00275                                         sysmem_freeptr(pathout);
00276                                         
00277                                         
00279                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> > SLT;
00280                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::iterator it;
00281                                         
00282                                         root->rec_downSLT(&SLT, x->context);
00283                     
00284                                         t_atom_long vals[2];
00285                                         t_atom * SLTout = NULL;
00286                                         atom_alloc_array(2, &i, &SLTout, &err);
00287                                         if(err && i==2)
00288                                         {
00289                                                 for (it = SLT.begin(); it!=SLT.end(); it++)
00290                                                 {
00291                                                         vals[0]=(*it).first->get_statenb();
00292                                                         vals[1]=(*it).second;
00293                                                         atom_setlong_array(2,SLTout,2,vals);
00294                                                         outlet_list(x->out_SLT, NULL, 2, SLTout); // output
00295                                                 }
00296                                         }
00297                                         
00299                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00300                                 }
00301                         }
00302                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00303                 }
00304         }
00305         
00309         void OMax_path(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb)
00310         {
00311                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00312                 {
00313                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00314                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00315                         {
00316                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00317                                 {
00318                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00319                                         
00320                                         char err;
00321                                         long i = 0;
00322                                         list<O_state*> path;
00323                                         list<O_state*>::iterator pathit;
00324                                         
00326                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, x->context);
00327                                         
00328                                         t_atom_long pathvals[path.size()];
00329                                         t_atom * pathout = NULL;
00330                                         for (pathit = path.begin(); pathit!=path.end(); pathit++)
00331                                         {
00332                                                 pathvals[i]=(*pathit)->get_statenb();
00333                                                 i++;
00334                                         }
00335                                         atom_alloc_array((long)path.size(), &i, &pathout, &err);
00336                                         if(err)
00337                                         {
00338                                                 atom_setlong_array((long)path.size(),pathout, (long)path.size(),pathvals);
00340                                                 outlet_list(x->out_path, NULL, (short)path.size(), pathout);
00341                                         }
00342                                         sysmem_freeptr(pathout);
00343                                         
00345                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00346                                 }
00347                         }
00348                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00349                 }

00355         void OMax_fullpath(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb)
00356         {
00357                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00358                 {
00359                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00360                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00361                         {
00362                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00363                                 {
00364                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00365                                         
00366                                         char err;
00367                                         long i = 0;
00368                                         list<O_state*> path;
00369                                         list<O_state*>::iterator pathit;
00370                                         
00372                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, 0);
00373                                         
00374                                         t_atom_long pathvals[path.size()];
00375                                         t_atom * pathout = NULL;
00376                                         for (pathit = path.begin(); pathit!=path.end(); pathit++)
00377                                         {
00378                                                 pathvals[i]=(*pathit)->get_statenb();
00379                                                 i++;
00380                                         }
00381                                         atom_alloc_array((long)path.size(), &i, &pathout, &err);
00382                                         if(err)
00383                                         {
00384                                                 atom_setlong_array((long)path.size(),pathout, (long)path.size(),pathvals);
00386                                                 outlet_list(x->out_path, NULL, (short)path.size(), pathout);
00387                                         }
00388                                         sysmem_freeptr(pathout);
00389                                         
00391                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00392                                 }
00393                         }
00394                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00395                 }

00401         void OMax_sortedSLT(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb)
00402         {
00403                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00404                 {
00405                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00406                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00407                         {
00408                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00409                                 {
00410                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00411                                         
00412                                         char err;
00413                                         long i = 0;
00414                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> > SLT;
00415                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::iterator it;
00416                                         
00417                                         SLT = *state->sortedSLT(x->context);
00418                                         
00419                                         t_atom_long vals[2];
00420                                         t_atom * SLTout = NULL;
00421                                         atom_alloc_array(2, &i, &SLTout, &err);
00422                                         if(err && i==2)
00423                                         {
00424                                                 for (it = SLT.begin(); it!=SLT.end(); it++)
00425                                                 {
00426                                                         vals[0]=(*it).first->get_statenb();
00427                                                         vals[1]=(*it).second;
00428                                                         atom_setlong_array(2,SLTout,2,vals);
00429                                                         outlet_list(x->out_SLT, NULL, 2, SLTout); // output
00430                                                 }
00431                                         }
00432                                         
00433                                         list<O_state*> path;
00434                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, x->context);
00436                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00437                                 }
00438                         }
00439                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00440                 }
00441         }

00446         void OMax_sortedSLTbis(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb, long nbsol)
00447         {
00448                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00449                 {
00450                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00451                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00452                         {
00453                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00454                                 {
00455                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00456                                         
00457                                         char err;
00458                                         long i = 0;
00459                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> > SLT;
00460                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::iterator it;
00461                                         
00462                                         if (nbsol>0)
00463                                                 SLT = *state->sortedSLT(x->context, (int)nbsol);
00464                                         else
00465                                                 SLT = *state->sortedSLT(x->context);
00466                                         
00467                                         t_atom_long vals[2];
00468                                         t_atom * SLTout = NULL;
00469                                         atom_alloc_array(2, &i, &SLTout, &err);
00470                                         if(err && i==2)
00471                                         {
00472                                                 for (it = SLT.begin(); it!=SLT.end(); it++)
00473                                                 {
00474                                                         vals[0]=(*it).first->get_statenb();
00475                                                         vals[1]=(*it).second;
00476                                                         atom_setlong_array(2,SLTout,2,vals);
00477                                                         outlet_list(x->out_SLT, NULL, 2, SLTout); // output
00478                                                 }
00479                                         }
00480                                         
00481                                         list<O_state*> path;
00482                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, x->context);
00484                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00485                                 }
00486                         }
00487                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00488                 }
00489         }
